name: print-friendly-portfolio-cv
title: Print-friendly Portfolio CV
desc: A minimalist portfolio configurable via one JSON
article:
Simple and minimalistic portfolio, easily turned into a PDF resume that hides sections not relevant to the CV, such as profile picture and projects.

All personal information is configurable from a single JSON file, plus you can choose one of the colour themes, red, blue, green, cyber and default, with its variants in dark mode, or create your own by changing a couple of CSS variables.

github.name: dev-portfolio
github.description: A minimalist portfolio configurable via one JSON
